name: French Autumn
description: Autumn in France is one of the loveliest times of the year. From the end of September to the end of November the weather is often mild in most of France â€“ warm in the day with a chill at night and its the perfect chance to take some wonderful photos.

name: Gland Switzerland
description: Gland is known to have been a prehistoric settlement. During the Roman period a farm called Villa Glands was there. Until the 1960s, Gland was merely a small farming village (essentially vineyards and cattle).

name: Discover Japan
description: We return to the extraordinary world of Japanese handcrafted products for our 22nd issue. With the help of local specialists, we look at beautifully crafted items for daily and a little special use that are sure to delight and enrich your daily routine.
